fields.description:
I was running GUI CI tests against the VPC setup http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/140/, also some cloud formation tests were run against it.

Recently I noticed very long response times and the following error on CLC:

{code}
2017-02-08 07:46:34 PSTERROR:  deadlock detected
2017-02-08 07:46:34 PSTDETAIL:  Process 63459 waits for ExclusiveLock on tuple (0,113) of relation 17040 of database 16384; blocked by process 64571.
        Process 64571 waits for ShareLock on transaction 2283326; blocked by process 63459.
        Process 63459: update eucalyptus_simpleworkflow.swf_workflow_execution set creation_timestamp=$1, last_update_timestamp=$2, version=$3, metadata_display_name=$4, metadata_last_state=$5, metadata_state=$6, metadata_state_change_stack=$7, metadata_account_id=$8, metadata_unique_name=$9, metadata_user_id=$10, metadata_user_name=$11, cancel_requested=$12, close_status=$13, close_timestamp=$14, decision_status=$15, decision_timestamp=$16, latest_activity_timestamp=$17, latest_execution_context=$18, retention_timestamp=$19, timeout_timestamp=$20 where id=$21 and version=$22
        Process 64571: update eucalyptus_simpleworkflow.swf_workflow_execution set creation_timestamp=$1, last_update_timestamp=$2, version=$3, metadata_display_name=$4, metadata_last_state=$5, metadata_state=$6, metadata_state_change_stack=$7, metadata_account_id=$8, metadata_unique_name=$9, metadata_user_id=$10, metadata_user_name=$11, cancel_requested=$12, close_status=$13, close_timestamp=$14, decision_status=$15, decision_timestamp=$16, latest_activity_timestamp=$17, latest_execution_context=$18, retention_timestamp=$19, timeout_timestamp=$20 where id=$21 and version=$22

2017-02-08 08:18:25 PSTDETAIL:  Process 63439 waits for ExclusiveLock on tuple (3,14) of relation 17040 of database 16384; blocked by process 64048.
        Process 64048 waits for ShareLock on transaction 2284334; blocked by process 63439.
